title.rendered: *Best Seller* J Beauty Synthetic Curl Extensions

content.rendered:
Here’s a step-by-step guide for using J Beauty Synthetic Clip-on Hair Extensions:

  1. Lay out your extensions or wefts on a flat surface, grouping together extensions of like sizes.
  2.  Part your hair into sections.
  3. Take a perpendicular section of hair from your part down to your ear and tease the roots to create a base to hold the hair extensions.
  4. Take the J Beauty Synthetic Clip-on Hair Extension and use the clip side to attach it to the teased area, securing it in place.
  5. Repeat the process, sectioning off hair and clipping on the hair extensions until you achieve the desired volume and length.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Please keep in mind that J Beauty Synthetic Clip-on Hair Extensions are not heat-resistant, so do not use any heat on the hair extensions.

excerpt.rendered:
J Beauty’s Synthetic Hair Extensions – the ideal solution to effortlessly enhance the length and volume of your hair while maintaining its natural allure. Our clip-in hair pieces are thoughtfully designed to offer various thickness options, ensuring you can tailor your look to suit your unique preferences.

 

Our synthetic hair extensions are skill-fully styled with long-lasting curls that retain their shape over time, guaranteeing durability and effortless upkeep. Whether you have a wedding or a special event on the horizon or simply desire a voluminous, bouncy look for everyday life, these pre-made extensions are the perfect choice.

 

With user-friendliness at the forefront of our design, our synthetic hair extensions are exceptionally easy to apply.

 

What you will you get.

1 Set of J Beauty Synthetic Hair Extensions consist of:

1 Piece x 5 clips
1 Piece x 3 clips
2 Pieces x 2 clips
